text: Sambuca di Sicilia (Sicilian: Sammuca) is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Agrigento in the Italian region Sicily. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Pro loco Sambuca "L'Araba Fenicia" - Tourism promotion * Sambuca di Sicilia on MySpace * The Project City .com * Sambuca di Sicilia, Agrigento, Sicily, Italy - e-borghi Category:Settlements in Agrigento
title: Sambuca di Sicilia
